item.title: Elon Musk’s Tesla hopes to win back customers by offering free charging if you buy a $100,000 Cybertruck
item.description: Demand for the vehicles has slowed considerably.

item.title: Howard Lutnick says Trump may give Canada and Mexico some wiggle room for his tariffs just one day after rolling them out
item.description: The U.S. stock market has given up all of the gains since Trump's victory in last year's presidential election.

item.title: Oura’s plans to ensure consumers keep a ring on it
item.description: Some of the appeal of an Oura Rings is its ability to reveal truths about the health and fitness of its wearers.

item.title: Best Buy CEO Corie Barry offers her outlook on Trump’s ‘volatile’ trade war: ‘Tariffs at this level will result in price increases’
item.description: Best Buy's shares fell 13% as Wall Street waits to see tariffs' impact on consumers.

item.title: How a new generation of AI coaches could transform management training as we know it
item.description: Can a robot teach you how to be a better boss?
